movie.title: Airplane!
movie.plot: Still craving for the love of his life, Ted Striker follows Elaine onto the flight that she is working on as a member of the cabin crew. Elaine doesn't want to be with Ted anymore, but when the crew and passengers fall ill from food poisoning, all eyes are on Ted.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 6 nominations.
